abstract: Cuyahoga County, Ohio, sheriff's investigators submit findings on 2014 police shooting death of black child Tamir Rice to county prosecutor Timothy J McGinty, who is expected to review case and present it to grand jury.
lead_paragraph: The 12-year-old’s death was one of several recent cases that have spurred protests and raised questions about how the police interact with African-Americans.

headline.main: Prosecutor Receives Findings in Fatal Shooting of Tamir Rice by Cleveland Police
headline.print_headline: Prosecutor Receives Findings in Cleveland Police Shooting

snippet: The 12-year-old’s death was one of several recent cases that have spurred protests and raised questions about how the police interact with African-Americans.
